value.title: What the French Toast is a Slowly Changing Dimension???
value.excerpt: Want to know more about a slowly changing dimension? What about the different types? Patrick goes through examples and ties in the surrogate key! value.title: What the heck are BUILD PERMISSIONS in Power BI?!?
value.excerpt: Adam look at Power BI build permissions with shared datasets. Taking the mystery out of how you can interact with datasets and know what to do if you can't use it. This also looks at how Power BI free users can use shared datasets with Power BI Premium.  ******** LET'S CONNECT! ********  -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube

value.title: What's a Junk Dimension and when should you use it?

value.title: Power BI Apps and App Workspaces: How to distribute Power BI content to a Large Audience
value.excerpt: Power BI Apps are a terrific way to distribute your Power BI content to a large audience.  You can "Publish App" to Entire Organization or specific individuals and groups.
